pageContext.claim: “They [Democrats] want to release the dangerous criminal aliens and convicted felons onto the street. I refuse to let democrats hold America hostage.”
pageContext.analysis: No, Biden is calling for a 100-day moratorium on deportations and continued enforcement of immigration law. He has said he would return to the Obama-era policy of prioritizing gang members and those convicted of violent crimes -- a policy Trump rescinded shortly before he began to separate families at the border.
